wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi, everyone. This Monday we find out that the Fed is not likely to make a move when it meets this week, though it is expected to smooth the way for a rate cut later in the summer. We learn that even relatively wealthy Americans are worried about their finances. Lack of savings paints a disconcerting picture about financial preparedness in America. Sotheby’s auction house announced Monday that it’s signed an agreement to be acquired by BidFair USA. And gain insights from a 32-year old as they discuss lessons learned throughout life, and how this impacts their financial perceptions.

 

ECONOMY

The Fed is likely to drop ‘patient’ word this week, clearing way for July cut, economists say

Even with President Donald Trump and the markets calling for lower interest rates, the Fed is not likely to make a move when it meets this week, though it is expected to smooth the way for a rate cut later in the summer.

 

HEALTH

Even Wealthy Americans Say Financial Worries Hurt Their Mental Health

Even relatively wealthy Americans are so worried about their finances that it’s affecting their mental and physical health.

 

RETIREMENT

Scary Numbers About Retirement Saving

Lack of savings paints a disconcerting picture about financial preparedness in America, with nearly a third of U.S. adults within three paychecks of needing to either borrow money or skip paying one or more bills.

 

MARKETS

Sotheby’s auction house is being taken private by  group controlled by art collector Patrick Drahi

Sotheby’s auction house announced Monday that it’s signed an agreement to be acquired by BidFair USA, a venture owned wholly by media entrepreneur and art collector Patrick Drahi.

 

PERSONAL FINANCE

32 Thoughts From a 32-Year-Old

You work really hard to get money…and then once you have it you spend time worrying whether you’re putting it to work right.
